#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int palind(long long int n)
{long long int r;
	r=0;
	if(n==0)
	return 0;
	else{
		while(n!=0)
		{
			r=r*10+n%10;
			n=n/10;
		}
	}
	return r;
}

int main(void) {
	int t;
	long long int n;
	cin>>t;

	int count;
	while(t--)
	{count=0;
		cin>>n;
	while(palind(n)!=n){
		n=n+palind(n);
		count++;
}
	cout<<count<<" "<<n<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
